title: TV Tropes provides information about its attitude towards ethical, social or political problems or controversies

tosdr.case: The service provides information about its attitude towards ethical, social or political problems or controversies
tosdr.tldr: TV Tropes will take a neutral standing toward any controversial opinion on the site, and will try to keep all real life political talk to a minimum. Until a controversy reaches a definitive standpoint across the board, TV Tropes will not allow heated discussion of it to tamper with their stated goals of cataloging information.
